comment.author: 68553684@N02
comment._content: Thank you for releasing this photo into the public domain - we've used it in issue four of Guru, a free digital science / lifestyle magazine (page 28). gurumagazine.org

comment.author: 37547255@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/gurumagazineltd] Thank you for telling us :). It's always interesting to see photos from our collections being used in new contexts. We'll be sure to take a look at the magaszine.
